value.title: Love of travel in the time of coronavirus: Why I kept going
value.excerpt: Me? I'm an introvert and like my "alone" time, but when it comes to travel my appetite has few boundaries. So in the midst of (quite legitimate) concerns about coronavirus, I took a weekend trip to Puerto Vallarta.
